sentences.en: Don't trivialize the seriousness of the issue!
sentences.cn: 不要小看这问题的严重性!

sentences.en: It never ceases to amaze me how the business world continues to trivialize the world's environmental problems.
sentences.cn: 商界一直不重视世界环境问题，总让我惊讶不已。

sentences.en: The article trivializes the whole issue of equal rights.
sentences.cn: 文章对平等权利这个大问题轻描淡写。

sentences.en: The debate has been trivialized by the media.
sentences.cn: 那场辩论在媒体的报道中变得无关紧要。
有许许多多影片把暴力行为描述成是鸡毛蒜皮的事.

words.tran_cn: 不重要的，琐碎的；琐细的

trans.tran_cn: <贬>使显得琐碎[不重要、不难等]，轻视
trans.tran_en: to make something seem less important or serious than it really is – used to show disapproval
